arcs.headline: Welcoming the next wave of open-source contributors
arcs.summary: We've refreshed our documentation and contributing guidelines to make onboarding smoother for prospective Google Summer of Code (GSoC) participants.

one_liner: Laying the groundwork for Google Summer of Code with updated contributor docs.
